item.title: Stability vs Innovation in the Smart Ecosystem
item.description: I wanted to take a moment to address a topic that’s been on my mind lately: the balance between stability and innovation within our Smart Ecosystem. As many of you know, our primary mission is to empower individuals with AI through open-source software.

item.title: Introduction to Smart Environments
item.description: Key Features Acts as a bridge between your local notes and AI tools, providing a controlled environment for data processing. Keeps your data on your local machine, ensuring privacy and security.

item.title: Smart Environment settings
item.description: The goal of the Smart Environment settings is to put users in control—enabling personal alignment with AI tools while keeping data secure and local. The Smart Environment architecture is designed to make it easy to integrate your personal workflows with the power of AI while maintaining privacy and improving outcomes through personal alignment.

item.title: Overview
item.description: A standalone application that connects ChatGPT to the Smart Environment on your local computer. Key Features Editing Capabilities: Allows ChatGPT to read and edit your local notes.

item.title: Overview
item.description: Purpose A plugin for the Obsidian note-taking application that leverages the Smart Environment to enhance note management and discovery. Key Features Smart Connections View: Displays relevant connections between notes using AI embeddings, helping you discover relationships within your data.

item.title: FAQs
item.description: Can I use Smart Connections without Smart Connect? Yes, Smart Connections can be used independently within Obsidian. Smart Connect adds additional functionality by integrating with ChatGPT.
